messages.subject: teaching ourselves
messages.msgSnippet: Some of my current interest that I m trying out or learning more about are: scrapbooking, using a little of the French I picked up living in N. Africa in high
messages.messageBody:
Some of my current interest that I'm trying out or learning more about are:
scrapbooking, using a little of the French I picked up living in N. Africa in
high school, homeschooling, civil war historical fiction, classical novels,
the piano, using the computer and digital camera,cooking healthy meals and using
more fruits and veggies.
My son likes to scrapbook with me and thinks it's funny when I read
children's books to him in French...maybe he'll want to learn someday.
Happy learning! Good luck with all those languages!
Amanda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
